name: PacMan with GunZ
description:
Description

PacMan all his life has been evading the Ghosts. NO MORE! PacMan has armed himself to the brim with weaponry and this includes: Pistols, Rifles, Shotguns, Airstrikes, Attack Dogs and even NUKES! The Ghosts are in for a real treat!

In this unique take on PacMan, the old retro game that everyone loves and knows, you can win in two ways: Collecting all the pellets on each map OR the more explosive way, getting the NUKE! 

This game was created for a project at the University of Wisconsin Whitewater. The team was tasked to take an old game and add in a new mechanic so, why not add in guns? Oh and don't forget about explosions! 

Credits

Dylan Oelke - Programmer, Designer

Lance Pearson - Programmer, Designer

The art was mostly re purposed PNG's from the internet. The PacMan sprites and Logo were gathered from sprite sheets found online. They belong to their respective owners.
